StringValues.16: A translation of a shadow's writing.
StringValues.15: A translation of a shadow's writing.

Pages.Text: It is time for the master to return. Cold darkness is seeping across the land and it's filling our bodies with new power. I can feel him waiting and his power is growing even in his imprisonment. He wants to be free. As much as  I fear the Virindi, I fear the Hopeslayer more. I shall seek them out and if they do not destroy me on sight, I shall ask for aid help in returning Bael'Zharon to Dereth. You will be free soon, First Herald. Then we shall free the Great Master. Soon...
